name: The Hands that Strike Dead
description:
The Hands that Strike Dead is a horror visual novel that takes place in an otherwise unassuming boarding school with a dark past. You play as a student who must uncover the deeds of your grandfather's past that haunted the student body. Could the horrors of the rumors all be true about him?

((Warning: This game contains sensitive themes, topics, and imagery.))

  • In-game player choices.
  • Investigation.
  • Original art.
  • An atmospheric and haunting soundtrack.
  • Multiple endings.
  • Your actions will decide your fate on this night...
